name: Spacelanes
description:
Scattered across the cosmos, hidden between the planets and the stars, lie the ancient and forgotten SPACELANES. Created by a long-dead race, possibly for transportation, they are now used mainly for sport. Mastering these roads requires patience, persistence, and quick reflexes. You will crash. A lot. But that's all part of the fun.

CONTROLS

  • LEFT/RIGHT or A/D - strafe left/right
  • UP/DOWN or W/S - accelerate/decelerate
  • SPACE - jump
  • Z/X or Q/E or PGUP/PGDOWN - barrel roll 
  • R - restart level
  • ESC - quit level

DISCLAIMER: THIS GAME IS IN DEVELOPMENT. THINGS WILL BREAK. CONTENT IS LACKING.
